instructions.text: Say START to begin after putting on the VR headset.

Next, you will be shown several rings.
If you don't see any, answer "0" or "none".
How many rings do you see?

The test will now start.
For each image, say how many rings you see.

text.question: How many rings do you see?
text.end: The test is finished. Please remove the VR goggles.
